Lead Platform Engineer on the Cedar team at Heroku, working with an amazing group of people to evolve and maintain the Cedar runtime which provides the foundation for our application platform. I was also fortunate to help build our a new platform control plane using gRPC, Go, and Kafka.Currently I'm working with system architects to design and prove-out our next generation, Kubernetes based application platform. The goal is to converge our Private Space offering with our Common Runtime application platform.
